summary: Marseille is France's oldest city, founded by Greek settlers around 600 BC. It's the second-largest city in France and a major port on the Mediterranean Sea. Known for its diverse culture, Marseille has a rich history as a trading hub. The city boasts the famous Old Port, the iconic Notre-Dame-de-la-Garde church, and the Grand Port Maritime, making it a key economic center. Marseille has also been a hub for sports and culture, hosting major events like the World Cup and being named European Capital of Culture.
title: Marseille
